code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useAuth}from'./AuthContext';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=_ref=>{let{onSwitch}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useAuth();const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/register',{username,email,password});login(response.data.token);}catch(error){var _error$response,_error$response$data;console.error(error);alert(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:(_error$response$data=_error$response.data)===null||_error$response$data===void 0?void 0:_error$response$data.message)||'Registration failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleRegister,className:"auth-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"auth-link",children:["Already have an account?
